summary: Valuable Hunting+ adds new and modified items to most large game animals, and changes the prices of hides, pelts, venison and beef, as well as mammoth tusks and Horker tusks.
descriptionHtml:
As Hircine, the Daedric Prince of the Hunt, has stated \"never waste the spoils of a kill\". Consume it\'s flesh and drink it\'s blood.

Well, you don\'t have to drink an animals blood to make use of the spoils, but you can if you\'d like. With this mod, the prices of hide and pelts have been increased so you can hunt without waste. Items are also being added to further incentivize hunting for profit.

v1.0 - Mod inception.
v1.01 - Added Deer Liver as ingredient.
v1.02 - Added Deer Blood potion, which has hunter friendly benefits.
v1.03 - Increased prices to better illustrate values.
v1.04 - Changed prices of Stews using affected meats, modified values of Horker Tusks and Meat, along with Mammoth Tusks.
author: Sigma2107
